rs6265.description: BDNF (Depression, Anxiety, PTSD) - Involved in brain plasticity and neurogenesis.
rs6265.effect: Increased risk for mood disorders such as depression and anxiety.
rs6265.chances_description: Moderate (20-30%) - Environmental factors play a significant role.

rs1800497.description: DRD2 (Addiction, Impulsivity) - Influences dopamine receptor sensitivity.
rs1800497.effect: Associated with impulsivity and increased addiction risk.
rs1800497.chances_description: Moderate to High (30-50%) - Strong association with addiction risk.
rs1800497.prevalence_description: 30% (T allele, linked to higher addiction risk)

rs40184.description: GRIK3 (Bipolar Disorder) - Involved in excitatory neurotransmission.
rs40184.effect: Linked to mood instability and bipolar disorder.
rs40184.chances_description: Low to Moderate (10-20%) - Limited data but possible impact on mood.
rs40184.prevalence_description: Limited data, C allele more common

rs1360780.description: FKBP5 (Stress Response, PTSD) - Regulates the stress hormone system.
rs1360780.effect: Increased stress sensitivity and PTSD risk.
rs1360780.chances_description: Moderate (25-35%) - Increased stress sensitivity with environmental triggers.
rs1360780.prevalence_description: 30-40% (T allele, linked to increased stress sensitivity)

rs1800955.effect: Associated with impulsivity and ADHD susceptibility.
rs1800955.chances_description: Moderate (20-40%) - Higher likelihood in combination with lifestyle factors.
rs1800955.prevalence_description: 20-30% (T allele, associated with impulsivity and attention issues)
